Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager

Class RegistrationManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager.RegistrationManager
public class RegistrationManager extends Object
RegistrationManager is a singleton object that represents registration system for (Wolf)PackScheduler. The object encapsulates the single instance of itself (singleton); catalog of Courses; directory of all Students. In addition, the object holds a reference to the currently logged-in (active) User (Student or Registrar) and single Registrar. The objects functionalities include:
  • Create a registrar.
  • Retrieve the Course catalog.
  • Retrieve the Student directory.
  • Login and logout.
  • Get current logged in User.
  • Enroll a Student in a Course.
  • Drop a Student from a Course.
  • Reset the Student Schedule.
  • Clear Course catalog and Student directory.
Author:
Dr. Sarah Heckman, Maxim Shelepov, Gabriel Perri

    • login

      public boolean login(String id, String password)
      Logs-in a User using the provided id and password. Sets as the current system User. If the User id matches but the password has doesn not, the login is not successful. If the User id doesn't match an IllegalArgumentException is thrown with "User doesn't exist.".
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the User to login
      password - the hashed password of the User
      Returns:
      true if the login was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the user doesn't exist

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs-out the current User by setting the current User to the Registrar.
